title: Determine String Rotation in Computer Science
description: In computer science, string rotation is a process of moving the characters in a string to the left or right. A string rotation of another string is a process of taking a string and moving its characters in a circular fashion. For example, the string 'abcde' can be rotated to form the string 'cdeab'. In this challenge, we are going to determine if a string s1 is a rotation of another string s2.

meta.title: String Rotation | Computer Science Algorithms
meta.description: Explore the concept of string rotation, a fundamental computer science algorithm, and learn how to determine if one string is a rotation of another.
meta.keywords: string rotation, computer science, algorithms, substring, programming, problem-solving
